remarks: In a Hausdorff topology, the equalizer of two continuous functions is closed (thus, two continuous functions which agree on a dense set agree everywhere).  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

hauseqlcld.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
hauseqlcld $p |- ( ph -> dom ( F i^i G ) e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) $.
